Html: How do I add potency to the list of selectable enchants for tankadins?

I'll add this for the next version. Until then, close Rawr, make a backup of your EnchantCache.xml file, open EnchantCache.xml in a text editor, and add this to the end, right before '</ArrayOfEnchant>':

<Enchant>
<Id>2668</Id>
<Name>Potency</Name>
<Slot>OneHand</Slot>
<Stats>
<Strength>20</Strength>
</Stats>
</Enchant>


That should do it. If you have any problems, switch back to your backup, and just wait for the next version.
Spellsurge for healers would be nice, its the new "in" thing :-D
